Full Stack Developer passionate about cr: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional web applications
fusionclinic_description: As the sole developer of Fusion Clinic — a medical room rental marketplace — I managed the migration from a third-party system to an in-house solution. Leveraged Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for front-end development, and Laravel for back-end maintenance, implementing key features like PIX payment integration (via external gateway). The platform served 700 users, delivering significant gains in performance, security, and customer experience.
yoobe_description: As a developer at Yoobe.co — a logistics platform connecting employees of major companies to corporate swag for performance rewards or celebrations — I contributed to the development and maintenance of the redemption e-commerce platform, supporting up to 10k simultaneous users. Leveraged Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS for performance optimization and UI enhancements, alongside tools like Docker, Git, and GCP for scalability. On the back-end, performed maintenance on the Ruby on Rails and Spree framework, ensuring seamless integration with the front-end. The platform served key clients like Pipefy, RD Station, and Yampi, maintaining stability during high-demand peaks.
